title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 630/97 of 10 April 1997 amending Commission Regulation (EC) No 2369/96 opening and providing for the administration of a Community tariff quota for 10 000 tonnes of oat grains otherwise worked falling within CN codes 1104 22 92 and 1104 22 99
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 630/97 of 10 April 1997 amending Commission Regulation (EC) No 2369/96 opening and providing for the administration of a Community tariff quota for 10 000 tonnes of oat grains otherwise worked falling within CN codes 1104 22 92 and 1104 22 99
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 April 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
